WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fix posted (in about 5 minutes from now)
WorkItem.Description: I load my character a Night Elf Druid - Cat, my professions load and my talents load, but nothing else will.  Current gear will not load, and there are no upgrades that load either just a note saying [Item not found - Automatic Armory] in the gear listing for each gear slot.  For some reason the Install Offline button will not work for me.

Comments.Message: What is your load stuff? Name Region and Realm
And did you give Rawr permission to create storage space?
Sorry for the wrong title, I granted Rawr permission to increase storage space.  Toon name: Eadric  Region: US  Realm: Thrall
Your item cache didn't load properly; just reset it. Tools > Reset All Caches.

I reset Item cache, screen flashes gear in the upgrade pane but as soon as I scroll mouse over anything for gear the screen goes blank and rawr is gone.  Repeatable.  Install Offline still doesn't work.
That sounds like a Video Driver issue

Install Offline I dont think works if you already have it installed offline
If you do, just load that one, it will update, then restart it again
So far so good now, thank you very much guys keep up the great work!
The Load from Armory/Wowhead may be an unrelated issue, we're testing it now
It was, fix will be posted shortly
